summary: WHILE DRIVING MY TRUCK I HAD TOTAL LOSS OF BRAKE FUNCTION WITHOUT WARNING. FURTHER INVESTIGATION SHOWED THE FLUID RESERVOIR WAS EMPTY DESPITE NO EVIDENCE OF LEAKS. I FEEL THIS IS INLINE WITH THE BRAKE BOOSTER/MASTER CYLINDER RECALLS OF 2013-2014 YEAR MODELS. I SUSPECT THE BRAKE FLUID HAS BEEN DRAWN INTO THE VACUUM BOOSTER. I'M AWAITING DEALERSHIP SERVICE AT THIS TIME. I WAS ON A MOUNTAIN ROAD AND LUCKILY WE WERE ON A LEVEL SPOT INSTEAD OF ON A HILL.
